scripts.i:yarn: concurrently "cd backend && yarn install && yarn upgrade" "cd frontend && yarn install && yarn upgrade" "cd mobile && yarn install && yarn upgrade"
scripts.i:npm: concurrently "cd backend && npm run install && npm run upgrade" "cd frontend && npm run install && npm run upgrade" "cd mobile && npm run install && npm run upgrade"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
